title: The Ultimate PDF Sharing Checklist  Sharing PDFs can be a breeze with Adobe Acrobat. Whether you're  collaborating on a project, seeking feedback, or simply distributing  information, this checklist will ensure you cover all the bases. Let's dive  into the essentials of sharing PDFs effectively.  General Sharing Checklist  Open Your PDF  Have you launched Acrobat or Acrobat Reader and opened  the PDF you want to share?  Choose Your Sharing Method  Are you sharing via email, link, or a third-party app like  Microsoft Teams or WhatsApp?  Set Permissions  Have you decided if recipients can comment or just view the  document?  Add Recipients  Did you enter the email addresses of everyone who needs  access?  Customize Your Message  Have you added a personal touch to the subject and message  fields?  Create and Share the Link  Did you generate a shareable link and copy it for distribution?  Send the Invitation
